structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.text:
The Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall update its database within thirty (30) days of receipt of information. The update shall include information from the:
Offender records;
Institutional records; and
Administrative records.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 158, effective June 20, 2005. -- Repealed, amended, reenacted, and renumbered 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 257, sec. 18, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1998.
